thread.title: German Tourists in Greece: Don't tell the cook we're German

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: German Tourists in Greece: Don't tell the cook we're German
text:
German Tourists in Greece: Don't tell the cook we're German Adv: 
Jul 18, 2015 Adv: 
Relations between Greek and German politicians may be tense amid the economic crisis, but empathy is easy to find on the streets of both countries. 
In the cafe outside the palace of Knossos in Crete, a family of tourists are wary of revealing where theyâ€™re from. According to legend, Theseus once slew the Minotaur in the ruins next door, and should the truth out itself, the Bayer family perhaps fear a repeat.
